video.title: Cunning Single Lady
video.synopsis: Ae-ra is broke and seeks revenge after learning that her ex-husband Jung-woo, whose business struggled during their marriage, has now made a fortune.

episodes.synopsis: When Jung-Woo's efforts to build a successful business finally pay off, his ex-wife Ae-Ra decides she wants him in her life again.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After three years apart, Jung-Woo and Ae-Ra reunite at the police station. He's become a wealthy CEO, while she's still a struggling divorcée.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Dreaming of getting the perfect revenge on Jung-Woo, Ae-Ra decides to go to work at his company as an intern.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: When Ae-Ra is accused of industrial espionage after her employee card goes missing, Jung-Woo comes to her rescue.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo realizes that keeping Ae-Ra around is risky since she knows all his weakness, but he doesn't have a legitimate reason to fire her.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The project involving Ae-Ra's parents' restaurant is a huge success, but there's panic when a customer claims that their food made him sick.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Yeo-Jin learns that Ae-Ra and Jung-Woo used to be married. Ae-Ra and Seung-Hyun grow closer, making Jung-Woo uneasy.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo and Ae-Ra do a photo shoot together, but something goes wrong. While trying to protect Ae-Ra, Jung-Woo gets hurt.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo and Ae-Ra have been spending a lot of quality time together because of work, and things seem to change a bit between them.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo witnesses Seung-Hyun's confession to Ae-Ra and is deeply troubled. Seung-Hyun finds out that Jung-Woo and Ae-Ra were married.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo has a better understanding of what Ae-Ra went through during their marriage and takes measures to spend more time with her.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Yeo-Jin advises Ae-Ra to stay away from Jung-Woo. Seung-Hyun arranges for Ae-Ra to interview at a new company.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo finally confesses his feelings to Ae-Ra. Meanwhile, the company is experiencing some financial trouble.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Ae-Ra finds out that Yeo-Jin is trying to cover up the scheme that put the company in jeopardy, Yeo-Jin breaks down and is taken to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Ae-Ra witnesses Chairman Guk threatening Jung-Woo and decides to let him go. The company learns that Jung-Woo and Ae-Ra were married.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Jung-Woo resigns from the company. Ae-Ra feels sorry for him but doesn't know if they should get back together.
episodes.title: Episode 16
